Title: A Closer Walk with Thee
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Carina Adly MacKenzie, Julie Plec, Michelle Paradise (executive story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by), Marguerite MacIntyre (staff writer)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Hayley confronts a surprising enemy as she and her unborn baby fall into peril during a celebratory wake to honor a fallen member of the community. In order to save Hayley, Klaus and Elijah...
